titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1212) to prevent the denial of employment opportunities by prohibiting the use of lie detectors by employers involved in or affecting interstate commerce.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-407.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/28/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1212 (polygraph use in employment).
